release.notes:
Sleeve shows main artist as The Edge with Michael Brook. Spine and center label shows main artist as only The Edge.
Etched matrices with stamped logos
The Edge and Larry Mullen Jnr. appear courtesy of Island Records Ltd.

℗ 1987 Virgin Records Ltd.
© 1987 Virgin Records America, Inc.

Manufactured and distributed by WEA through arrangement with Atlantic Records.

[label side A:]
Published by Virgin-Nymph Music (BMI) except:
[track A2] * Published by Virgin-Nymph Music (BMI) / Dizzy Heights Music Publishing / Rare Blue Music, Inc. (ASCAP)

[spine:]
Printed in the U.S.A.
